it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.controller.action.game

Class GameAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.controller.action.game.GameAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionSelection, CheckReloadWeapons, ExecutableEffect, GameActionAsync, MoveRollback, ObjectPickup, Payment, PowerUpSelection, SelectEffect, SelectWeapon, SpawnPointTrackSelection, SquareSelection

    public abstract class GameAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic game action that will be executed during a player's turn.
